morror array?

It depends. What is you BIOS set to boot from?
Is the external drive just a data drive?
Yeh
On my ubuntu HDD i have just noticed i don't have a swap drive or anything. I only have the one partition, is this an issue?
Then I would select both "sda" and "sdb", that way it will work no matter what your BIOS boots from. Do *not* select any partitions.
